Package store.business.util.writer

Class Writer<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.business.util.writer.Writer<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - E The generic type of the writer object
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientWriter, TransactionWriter
    public abstract class Writer<E>
extends java.lang.Object

    The writer object

    The writer is an object that has:

  • A document
  • An root element

Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Raphael Dray
